data.title: Obscure CSS to solve common CSS Problems

points.topic: Estelle's presentation had a great collection of every day problems that were solveable via normal css.
Writer of CSS the Definitive Guide.
Covered @supports which is new to the CSS spec. This is a browser fallback where you can add the latest code and if the browser 'supports' it it renders it. Great for grid and flexbox.
I highly recommend checking out her slides. Her presentation is chalk full of tactics to help web developers within their day to day.
She also has a ton of great links at the end of her presentation which are valuable to any web developer.
